nodes.text: Giarda was a Hutt who was one of the leading members of the Jiramma kajidic. Giarda operated on the moon Nar Shaddaa and at some stage during the time of the Galactic Civil War, she manipulated the bounty hunters Gorran and Nell into turning over the Sakiyan Razall to her, who had became an informant for the rival Gorensla Hutt clan.
